reviewtext: I'm using this with a set of Cambridge Soundworks 2.1 speakers since the original volume control stopped working and they no longer sell replacements.The cable is thin, and of decent length, but it is not that robust, so I don't know how much abuse it can take.I don't know what the circuitry is in on the inside, but for my speakers, I have to have the knob at a very low setting, otherwise the sound volume gets outrageously loud.  As a result, unless I have it above a certain level, I only get sound at the appropriate sound level from one channel.  If I increase the volume, then both channels sound fine.  So that is slightly irritating, but other than that, works well.
